channel.title: Kill command?
channel.description: hi all i was wondering is thier a way to make a kill command for admin or owner i cant think of what it would require to make it but if you could make a kill command that would work on any thing lik ::kill (monster/person,name)

item.title: Kill command?

could you post in in java code not so great at going from the english to the java when i tried what u just said i just got the worst error i have had in a while super crash of my server tried login in for like 50 mins couldnt get in tell i got fed up with trying to edit the code to work right

item.title: Kill command?
item.dc:creator: @hah_bah_gee hah bah gee
item.description:
@hah_bah_gee wrote:

  1. You could have downloaded a server with the command ::eat as it does the same thing (figmenscape).

  2. for a ::kill command basically add in command under all other ones, the declare the if command starts with kill and is more than 4 chars long (for the word and space) then playerDeath (might not be the same in other sources as iâ€™m naming it from my own source) == true for playerName.
